mapper.select: select subsp_id, member_id, subsp_sdt, subsp_edt, subsp_pay_st, subsp_amt, subsp_pay_mthd, subsp_pay_amt, subsp_mile, imp_uid, ins_dt, udt_dt, (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'LM' and scode = subsp_pay_st ) as subsp_pay_nm from subscription order by subsp_id, member_id, subsp_sdt

select subsp_id, member_id, subsp_sdt, subsp_edt, subsp_pay_st, subsp_amt, subsp_pay_mthd, subsp_pay_amt, subsp_mile, imp_uid, ins_dt, udt_dt, (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'LM' and scode = subsp_pay_st ) as subsp_pay_nm from subscription where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update:
update subscription set subsp_id = #{subspId}, subsp_sdt = sysdate,
subsp_edt = to_char(add_months(sysdate, 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
subsp_edt = to_char(add_months(sysdate, 3), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
subsp_edt = to_char(add_months(sysdate, 12), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
subsp_pay_st = #{subspPaySt}, subsp_amt = #{subspAmt}, subsp_pay_mthd = #{subspPayMthd}, subsp_pay_amt = #{subspPayAmt}, subsp_mile = #{subspMile}, imp_uid = #{impUid}, udt_dt = sysdate where member_id = #{memberId}
